transArray.content: I chose their store when I came to Beijing for the first time. After looking around, I found that it is convenient for traveling. It is opposite Metro Line 6, which is very convenient. The front desk service is also very attentive and very good.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and taking your precious time to share your stay experience with us. It is our honor to provide you with a clean and comfortable stay. As you said, the hotel is located in the Badali Automobile Park on the West Fourth Ring Road. , it is only a five-minute walk from Haidian Wuluju Station on Metro Line 6. Public transportation is accessible in all directions and travel is convenient. Thank you for your support and recognition, which makes all our staff at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel confident on the road ahead. Looking forward to meeting you every time! I wish you all the best! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
